name: MountKelvin
0:
”Alexa, turn on lights”
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
”Alexa, set reading light to 40 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Control your Mount Kelvin connected lights via Alexa. You can activate scenes and switch the lights on and off in individual rooms. In order to use this skill, you need a Mount Kelvin site key, which is provided to you when purchasing a Mount Kelvin lighting control system.
